TextLibrary.Text: Travel to Aquila Port as an friend of Lumina. . .
Ask about the Weapon
Lumina has a task for you
You aren't liked enough by Lumina.
You are too friendly with Quesada to be trusted.
Accept the task at Aquila Port
Accept the task
Have ED24 Encrypt the data on Mars
Encrypt the data
The next data is hidden on Earth
Have ED24 Encrypt the data on Earth
Encrypt the data
The next data is hidden within the Centauri Shipyard
Have ED24 Encrypt the data at the Centauri Shipyard
Encrypt the data
The next data is on Polaris Base
Have ED24 Encrypt the data on Polaris Base
Encrypt the data
A Quesadan Seeker has been detected
Eliminate the Quesadan Seeker
Attack the Seeker
The next data is somewhere in Beta Centauri
Have ED24 Encrypt the data in the Beta Centauri System
Encrypt the data
The last data is on Ramses III
Have ED24 Encrypt the data on Ramses III
Encrypt the data
A second Quesadan Seeker has been detected
Eliminate the second Quesadan Seeker
Attack the Seeker
Mission Complete -- Return to Earth
Return to Earth for your reward
Report your success
Lumina gives you their Psi-Weapon
